| HistoryText             = 
===Overview===
'''ICON''' was an organization formed by Undersecretary [[Geoffrey Sydenham (Earth-616)|Geoffrey Sydenham]] and Senator Sanford using [[Operation Paperclip (Earth-616)|Operation Paperclip]] to recruit former [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazis]] and use them against the communists. 

===Events===
The team came into conflict with that era's [[Avengers (1950s) (Earth-616)|Avengers]], after unsuccessfully attempting to assassinate their ranks. When the conspiracy was discovered the organization was disbanded, but none of the members were imprisoned because the American government didn't want to admit that the group had any connection to them.{{r|Avengers 1959 Vol 1 1|5}}
